name: 0x13 - Advanced Web Attacks
description:
The 13th focuses on Advanced Web Attacks. After starting the class:
  1. Connect to a class lab with command ssh root@class13 and 'admin' password from hackerlab
  2. From a new terminal on your computer (NOT StratoCyberLab), execute a following command
    ssh -L 3000:juiceshop:3000 root@127.0.0.1 -p 2222 with password ByteThem123. The command setups port forwarding so you can access the class services in your browser.
